sentences.en: After a moment's indecision, he said yes.
sentences.cn: 他犹豫片刻之后答应了。

sentences.en: At the moment of indecision, we helped them make up their minds.
sentences.cn: 正在进退两难的当口, 我们帮他们下了决心.

sentences.en: For forty - eight hours, Hayward lived in an agony of indecision.
sentences.cn: 海沃德足足有 四十八 小时坐卧不安,拿不定主意.

sentences.en: He had lost ground these latter months from indecision.
sentences.cn: 近几个月来,他就是因为迟疑不决才吃亏的.

sentences.en: He halted before the door in indecision.
sentences.cn: 他在门前犹豫不决地停了下来.

sentences.en: He stood outside the door in an agony of indecision.
sentences.cn: 他站在门外,不知如何是好,非常难受.

sentences.en: His indecision caused him to lose the chance of a new challenging job.
sentences.cn: 他的犹豫不决使他失去了一次得到新具有挑战性的工作的机会.
优柔寡断是他的主要缺点.

sentences.en: Olivier , in the film, makes Hamlet a figure of tragic indecision.
sentences.cn: 在该影片中, 奥立维尔把哈姆雷特演成了优柔寡断的悲剧人物.

sentences.en: She has done her best to keep calm but finds herself trembling with tension and indecision.
sentences.cn: 她尽力保持镇定，可还是由于紧张、犹豫不决而抖个不停。

sentences.en: She was in an agony of indecision.
sentences.cn: 她陷于犹豫不决的痛苦之中.

sentences.en: The answer was so long in coming, though there was no indecision in it.
sentences.cn: 这句答话虽不含什么优柔寡断的意味, 却来得那么迟.

sentences.en: The team has been plagued by indecision and internal divisions.
sentences.cn: 优柔寡断与内部分裂深深困扰着该团队。

sentences.en: Their indecision has been replaced by confidence and steely determination.
sentences.cn: 他们的优柔寡断已经被自信和钢铁般的决心所取代。

sentences.en: There were weeks of indecision about who would go and when.
sentences.cn: 关于谁去和什么时候去的问题几个星期以来一直悬而未决。

sentences.en: Tuesday came , and with it appropriate indecision and speculation.
sentences.cn: 到了星期二, 她仍是左思右想举起不定.

words.tran_cn: 犹豫不决的；非决定性的

trans.tran_en: the state of being unable to decide what to do
